name: Panic Factory
description:
This game was submitted as part of the  GMTK 2020 game jam.

Description:

Try to survive the longer possible inside this messy (about to explode) factory !

Inputs:
  • Ctrl (or X/Square on Gamepad) to connect/deconnect your pipe to a pump.
  • Space (or A/Cross on Gamepad) to shoot liquid.
  • Arrows keys/WASD (or left joystick) to move and aim with your pipe.
Rules:

Extinguish the fires before they consume all the factory life's bar. But beware you must extinguish it with the right color (as pictured on the panel). Spraying a liquid makes an other pump's gauge fill faster and if its bar goes full it will overheats and more fire will spread ! Try to manage the level of each gauge while dealing with fire.  When a fire has grown to its maximum size it deals continuous damage to the factory. Protect it worker !
